content: snood / neckwarmer for dogs a jacknitss design by jacqueline gibb free pattern jack russel dog greyhound materials 75 grams uk chunky yarn i used stylecraft life chunky in barley marl for the beige snood shown on both dogs or 100 grams of uk double knit yarn used double i used 1 strand of brown and 1 strand of rust together of cygnet double knit yarn which is one of the thinner double knits 1 pair needles size 5 mm cast on 72 stitches using the long tail method work 50 row of k2 p2 rib or until the work measures 10inches the photos show both the jack russell and the greyhound wearing the same size snood so you may want to make the smaller dog s a tad shorter cast off in rib using a larger sized needle to keep it loose with the right sides together oversew the seam note when i knit rib i always knit in to the back of the knit stitches for a nicer finish
